Package io.github.mbarre.schemacrawler.tool.linter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LinterBlobTypeColumn  
    LinterBooleanContent
    Linter to check if numeric column is used instead of boolean column Created by barmi83 on 28/12/15.
    LinterByteaTypeColumn
    Created by barmi83 on 3/10/17.
    LinterColumnContentNotNormalized
    Test column contents normalization.
    LinterColumnSize  
    LinterCompressBlob
    Created by barmi83 on 3/24/17.
    LinterForbiddenPrimaryKeyType  
    LinterForeignKeyMismatchLazy
    Check that foreign key has the same type as the associated primary key, using the Java sql type instead of jdbc type.
    LinterForeignKeyName
    Check that foreign key name has right prefix or suffix name Created by barmi83 on 12/09/16.
    LinterJsonContent
    Linter to check if non JSONB type is used whereas JSON data is store in column
    LinterJsonTypeColumn
    Linter to check if JSON type is used instead of JSONB - PostgreSQL reserved lint
    LinterLeftSpacePadding  
    LinterNoSpaceInNames  
    LinterOrphanTable
    Linter to check if a table has foreign key or is referenced in any other table.
    LinterPluralTableName
    Linter to check if a table has its name plural ou singular Table represents a collection of entities, there is no need for plural names.
    LinterPrimaryKeyNotIntegerLikeType  
    LinterRightSpacePadding
    Linter to check if text column has length(rtrim(column)) == length(column)
    LinterTableNameNotInLowerCase
    Check that objects (tables, columns) have name in lower case
    LinterXmlContent
    Linter to check if non XML type is used whereas XML data is store in column
